title: My lol just freezes whenever i log on. patch 5.5
body: I dont know what going on with my lol it was working 2 days ago but after patch 5.5 i just kept freezing.

replies.body: Same here.  In game freeze then crash since 5.5.  I can see my character and move a bit for about 3 seconds then boom.
OMG 2 PATCHES LATER STILL GETTING IT and exact same things happening and i keep getting low priority shitttt that i have to wait for like 10 mins AND ITS CAUSE RITO DOESNT KNOW HOW TO FIX THERE GAME
yeah my lol freezes after i log on, i just got patch 5.6 so its not patch 5.5.
2 mates of mine are having frame rate drops, its just frame drops not DCing and its just since todays(13/4) patch

Hey Derpyberpderp

First Question - when is your client freezing?  On launch? After logging in? During games?

As suggested below, trying a repair of the client might be a good first step - [instructions here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq6)

Let me know how you go
happens to me as well, tried the Repair function but nothing changed, cmon Rito :( after reading all the bug Reports for 5.5 it feels more like SS **Bug** not Buff
it is the same thing for me :(
